name: Timber Rhythm
description:
A retro-inspired music sandbox, for PCVR (SteamVR). Jam out, and let the Loop Machine play it back to you~

Included instruments:

  • Drum kit (Snare, kick, closed hi-hat, crash cymbal)
  • 5 synths (3 square synths, a triangle synth, and a pitch-shifted noise synth)

This project is on GitHub! If you're interested, you can also check out my other projects at request.moe!
